subject: You have completed your eligibility check to finance your Howdens products

rows.text: You have completed your eligibility check for finance for your Howdens products. Howdens will be in touch shortly to continue the design process. Once your design has been finalised, your order will be confirmed by your tradesperson and you will be able to apply for finance.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
